text: A bus stop is a designated place where buses stop for passengers to get on and off the bus. Bus stops at busy locations may have shelters, seating, and electronic passenger information systems; less busy stops may use a simple pole to mark the location. == Related pages == * Automatic vehicle location * Bus bulb * Bus Safety Act * Bus station * Bus terminus * Hail and ride * Intermodal passenger transport * Metro station * Street furniture * Train station * Tram stop * Ticket (admission) * Wait/walk dilemma ==Other websites== * * Stop Category:Street furniture
